name: claudecode-plugins
description: Marketplace de plugins da comunidade para Claude Code

plugins.name: git-commit-helper
plugins.description: Automatiza commits Git com validações completas, conventional commits e integração com CI/CD. Suporte automático para projetos Python com uv (universal virtualenv). NOVO: /quick-commit para commits rápidos sem validações extensivas

plugins.name: kubernetes-specialist
plugins.description: Advanced plugin for Kubernetes resource management, troubleshooting, and best practices implementation with MCP integration. Features: diagnostic commands for pod failures, resource optimization for cost reduction, manifest generation with security hardening, 2 agents with MCP kubernetes-toolkit integration and skill-first knowledge loading, 2 comprehensive skills for best practices and troubleshooting patterns, and MCP server for direct Kubernetes API access. 2025 best practices addressing 99.94% industry over-provisioning issue.

plugins.name: aws-documentation-helper
plugins.description: Comprehensive AWS documentation access and knowledge assistant powered by AWS Knowledge MCP Server. Features: 3 commands (/aws-docs, /aws-compare, /aws-examples) for service search, comparison and code examples; 1 autonomous agent for natural language AWS queries; 2 skills covering 200+ AWS services and Well-Architected Framework best practices; HTTP MCP integration with AWS Knowledge API.
